Title: Manic Weather Control
Description: Asp.net custom control that shows current weather conditions and weather forecast. Data is supplied by weather.com service.
HomeWiki:
Description
Asp.net custom control that shows current weather conditions and weather forecast. Data is supplied by weather.com service.

Technology
  • Development: Visual Studio 2008
  • Target framework: 2.0 and above

Controls
  • CurrentConditions
  • Forecast

Freatures
  • Shows current conditions for given location.
  • Shows forecast for given location and number of days.
  • Data caching.
  • Fully localized control.

Licence
  • GNU Library General Public License (LGPL)

Support
  • Please ask your questions in "Discussions" section.
  • Please submit bugs and requests in "Issue Tracker" section.
